Game.Name: Super Cartridge Ver 8 - 4 in 1 (Asia) (Unl)
Game.plot: No information online about this Unlicensed game. ~Rx
Game.Notes: Super Cartridge Version 8: 4-in-1: Final Combat, Worm Visitor, Frog Adventure, Magical Tower; all except Final Combat were ported from the Game Boy exclusively for this cartridge.
